decision_conditions: Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority (before the building(s) is/are occupied/used).
Condition : 4 - The window formed in the east elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the eastern wall of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of single storey rear extension to dwellinghouse
